Too many cheaters and toxic people. To be an overwatch, you have to win 150 and be Nova 1... That’s why many people people without cheats are getting banned, because Novas don’t understand yet who is cheating and who’s not. I’m nova, and played with novas. They were calling out that enemies were cheating, BUT HOW WHEN THEY WERENT?! If you are going to buy this game, know, you can get banned if you play too good on novas.
